channel.title: English on Tao Te Ching Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in English on Tao Te Ching Simplified

item.title: Chapter 5: The Tao or True Nature is Nothingness, Yet is Omnipotent
item.description: 1 Heaven and earth do not act from the impulse of any wish to be benevolent. They deal with all things as the dogs of grass are dealt with. The sages do not act from any wish to be benevolent. They deal with the people as the dogs of grass are dealt with. 2 The space between heaven and earth can be compared to a bellows.
